Presentation Layer
templates / UI base.html, home.html, login.html, register.html catalog.html, cart.html, checkout.html profile.html, edit_profile.html, order_history.html order_detail.html, addresses.html, payment_methods.html balance.html, favorites.html, support.html support_detail.html, product_reviews.html manager/dashboard.html, manager/products_list.html manager/orders_list.html, manager/users_list.html manager/support_list.html, manager/analytics.html admin/dashboard.html, admin/orders_list.html admin/users_list.html, admin/products_list.html admin/promotions_list.html, admin/support_list.html admin/backups_list.html, admin/analytics.html management/dashboard.html, 404.html, 500.html Static: CSS (style.css, theme.css, admin.css, cart.css, catalog.css, checkout.css, profile.css, support.css), JS (api.js, admin-shortcuts.js), Images

Application Layer
controller views.py (home, login_view, register_view, catalog, cart_view, checkout, profile_view, edit_profile, order_history_view, order_detail_view, addresses_view, payment_methods_view, balance_view, favorites, support_view, support_ticket_detail, manager_dashboard, manager_products_list, manager_orders_list, manager_users_list, manager_support_list, manager_analytics, admin_orders_list, admin_order_detail, management_dashboard, management_users_list, management_orders_list, management_promotions_list, handler404, handler500)
api.py ViewSets: RoleViewSet, UserProfileViewSet, UserAddressViewSet, CategoryViewSet, BrandViewSet, SupplierViewSet, ProductViewSet, ProductSizeViewSet, TagViewSet, ProductTagViewSet, CartViewSet, CartItemViewSet, OrderItemViewSet, PaymentViewSet, DeliveryViewSet, PromotionViewSet, ProductReviewViewSet, SupportTicketViewSet, ActivityLogViewSet
api.py APIViews: CheckEmailView, LoginView, RegisterView, ResetPasswordView, VerifyResetDataView, ProfileAPIView, AddressAPIView, AddressDetailAPIView, CartAPIView, CartItemAPIView, OrderAPIView, OrderDetailAPIView, PaymentMethodAPIView, PaymentMethodDetailAPIView, BalanceAPIView, AvailablePromotionsAPIView, ValidatePromoAPIView, ProductManagementAPIView, ProductManagementDetailAPIView, CategoryManagementAPIView, CategoryManagementDetailAPIView, BrandManagementAPIView, BrandManagementDetailAPIView, OrderManagementAPIView, OrderManagementDetailAPIView, UserManagementAPIView, UserManagementDetailAPIView, SupportTicketAPIView, SupportTicketDetailAPIView, CatalogAPIView, FavoritesAPIView, FavoriteDetailAPIView, ProductReviewAPIView, OrganizationAccountAPIView, PromotionManagementAPIView, PromotionManagementDetailAPIView, SupplierManagementAPIView, SupplierManagementDetailAPIView, RoleManagementAPIView, RoleManagementDetailAPIView, BackupManagementAPIView, BackupManagementDetailAPIView, UserSettingsAPIView

DTO / Serializers
serializers.py RoleSerializer, UserProfileSerializer, UserAddressSerializer CategorySerializer, BrandSerializer, SupplierSerializer ProductSizeSerializer, ProductImageSerializer, ProductSerializer TagSerializer, ProductTagSerializer, FavoriteSerializer CartItemSerializer, CartSerializer OrderItemSerializer, OrderSerializer PaymentSerializer, DeliverySerializer, PromotionSerializer ProductReviewSerializer, SupportTicketSerializer, ActivityLogSerializer SavedPaymentMethodSerializer, CardTransactionSerializer BalanceTransactionSerializer, ReceiptSerializer, ReceiptItemSerializer OrganizationAccountSerializer, OrganizationTransactionSerializer

Domain Layer
service utils.py (create_sql_dump, filter_profanity, restore_sql_dump) helpers.py (_user_is_admin, _user_is_manager, _log_activity) encryption.py (DataEncryption) metrics.py (UserMetrics, OrderMetrics, CatalogMetrics) metrics_influxdb.py (UserMetrics, OrderMetrics, CatalogMetrics) metrics_view.py (metrics_export) metrics_influxdb_view.py (metrics_influxdb_export, metrics_influxdb_check, metrics_influxdb_cleanup, metrics_influxdb_telegraf_view) db_procedures.py (calculate_order_total, apply_promo_to_order, update_user_balance, create_receipt) OrderService (business logic) PaymentService (business logic) BalanceService (business logic) ReceiptService (business logic) OrganizationAccountService (business logic)
security middleware.py (DatabaseEmptyCheckMiddleware, BlockedUserMiddleware, AdminAccessMiddleware, CustomErrorHandlerMiddleware) AuthenticationMiddleware, SessionMiddleware, CSRFMiddleware Django Auth (User, Permission) JWT Authentication, Custom Middleware Encryption (DataEncryption), Password Hashing Role-based Access Control

Infrastructure Layer
configuration manage.py, settings.py, wsgi.py, asgi.py, urls.py main/apps.py, main/middleware.py main/management/commands: fill_test_data.py, create_scheduled_backups.py, write_metrics_to_file.py, run_metrics_writer.py, send_influxdb_metrics.py docker-compose.yml, Dockerfile, nginx.conf, docker-entrypoint.sh, requirements.txt
model User, UserProfile, Role, UserAddress Category, Brand, Supplier Product, ProductImage, ProductSize Tag, ProductTag, Favorite Cart, CartItem, Order, OrderItem Payment, SavedPaymentMethod, CardTransaction Delivery, Promotion, PromoUsage ProductReview, SupportTicket BalanceTransaction, Receipt, ReceiptItem ReceiptConfig, OrganizationAccount OrganizationTransaction, ActivityLog DatabaseBackup, UserSettings
repository / data_access Django ORM (models.Manager) data_access.py (SafeQueryBuilder) db_procedures.py Custom QuerySets, Model Methods Database Transactions
